name: Jacob Milo
bio: Hi, I'm Jacob (he/him). I am a junior studying Chemical Engineering. I like playing tennis and basketball outside of EOB. I'm excited to answer any questions you have about engineering at UIUC!

name: Johnny Hernandez
bio: My name is Johnny Hernandez, a Junior in Mechanical Engineering, and will be the department chair for EOB this year. I'm super excited to help prospective students learn about UIUC!

name: Ramya Gandhi
bio: Hi, I'm Ramya (she/her)! I am a junior studying Systems Engineering & Design with a minor in Technology & Management. I am looking forward to a great year!

name: Naveen Nathan
bio: Hi, I'm Naveen! I'm a senior studying Computer Science and I'll be the Student Panel Coordinator for EOB this year. This is my third year on EOB and my fourth year in Engineering Council. My hobbies include playing basketball, watching movies, and playing video games!

name: Dev Wadhwa
bio: Hello, I am Dev Wadhwa! I'm a junior studying Computer Science with a minor in Business and the cross-section between the two is where I want to be!

name: Bhavika Kagathi
bio: Hi, I'm Bhavika (she/her). I am a junior studying bioengineering and minoring in electrical engineering. I am a shadow an engineer co-coordinator on EOB. I am also involved in EC as the co-director of EXPO and am also on EC Corporate. I am looking forward to a great semester!

name: Matthew Hokinson
bio: Hi, I'm Matt. I'm a Senior studying Computer Science in Grainger, and I'll be working as a Shadow-An-Engineer co-coordinator on EOB. I also work on course staff for our Systems Programming class here. In my free time I really enjoy cooking, running, and reading. I'm looking forward to a great semester!

name: Nathan Ryan
bio: Nathan (he/they) is a third year physics student interested in Nuclear and AMO physics. When not in class, he enjoys cooking, and is compiling the things he makes during the school year into a food journal. Feel free to reach out to Nathan if you have any questions about Physics, Nuclear Engineering, or anything else about UIUC.

name: Ariya Patel
bio: Hello! My name is Ariya Patel (she/her), and I am a sophomore in Computer Engineering. I am the External Outreach Chair for EOB! On campus, I am involved with Engineering Council as the DSAC Director and on EOB, EXPO, and Professional Development. I also am involved with Women in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Phi Chi Theta Professional Business Fraternity! I have loved working alongside a diverse and hard-working group of students. I look forward to what the next year holds!

name: Mary Ehmann
bio: Hi, I’m Mary! I am a junior majoring in Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering with a minor in Molecular and Cellular Biology. Some of my hobbies include baking, hiking and traveling. This year I’m looking forward to connecting students to Engineering at UIUC!

name: Sungyoon (Grant) Cho
bio: Hi, I’m Grant Cho! I am a sophomore studying aerospace engineering. I am a Facilities and Reservation Chair for the EOB this year and I am more than excited to serve this position. On campus, I also served as an orientation leader for the New Student Programs so I am looking forward to connect with more future Illini and share my experiences with Grainger engineering. In my free time, I like to play golf, go hang out with friends, and watch Bob Ross videos!

name: Joie Gindorf
bio: Hi! My name is Joie Gindorf and I am a sophomore in Civil Engineering. I am super excited to be involved in Engineering Council this year. I also serve on the SITE committee. I am a very proud Illini and love sharing my school spirit! My hobbies include playing golf and arts and crafts. I’m looking forward to an incredible semester!

name: Matthew Fang
bio: Hi, I'm Matthew Fang, a junior studying electrical engineering, and I am a Facilities and Reservations chair for EOB this year. In my free time, I enjoy making keyboards and computers and playing spikeball, basketball, and table tennis. I look forward to helping prospective Illini learn more about Grainger Engineering.

name: Leah Beran
bio: Hi, I'm Leah (she/her)! I am a junior studying Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering. My position in EOB is Internal Publicity Chair. About me: I am a light-hearted, science-loving, fun-seeking Illini. I can’t wait to share my experiences at Illinois with future Grainger Engineers. Outside of the classroom, I like to adventure and try new things, catch up with friends over coffee, and pet all the dogs on campus!
